scripts.build: NODE_PATH=./src ./node_modules/browserify/bin/cmd.js src/client/index.js -o public/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ]
scripts.start: npm run build && source .env node --harmony_default_parameters --harmony-destructuring src/server/index.js
scripts.start:dev: npm run build && source .env && nodemon --delay 2 --harmony_default_parameters --harmony-destructuring src/server/index.js
